description: Structured information on a quantitative value.
label: Quantitative value
name: QuantitativeValue

https://openminds.om-i.org/props/typeOfU._instruction: Add the type of uncertainty used to determine the uncertainty for this quantitative value.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/typeOfU.description: Distinct technique used to quantify the uncertainty of a measurement.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/typeOfU.label: Type of uncertainty
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/typeOfU.name: typeOfUncertainty

https://openminds.om-i.org/props/uncerta._instruction: Enter the uncertainty of this quantitative value.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/uncerta.description: Quantitative value range defining the uncertainty of a measurement.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/uncerta.label: Uncertainty
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/uncerta.name: uncertainty

https://openminds.om-i.org/props/unit._instruction: Add the unit of measurement of this quantitative value and its uncertainty.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/unit.description: Determinate quantity adopted as a standard of measurement.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/unit.label: Unit
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/unit.name: unit

https://openminds.om-i.org/props/value._instruction: Enter the value of this quantitative value.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/value.label: Value
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/value.name: value
